experience.title: Strategy Consulting intern
experience.description: - Worked with the founding team to conduct primary and secondary research to seek willingness of around 250 I&A management to adopt sustainable business practices- Based on the findings of the primary research an engagement framework with a detailed service offering and a 18 month pilot program has been developed along with a detailed GTM strategy - The ideated service offering is under the process of commercialization by the company management-> White Paper under review

experience.title: Equity Research Analyst
experience.description: Engaged in building, managing, and maintaining a virtual portfolio of stocks by monitoring BSE 500 companies. Performed extensive equity research on various sectors.

experience.title: Summer Research Intern
experience.description: - Dissertation Topic : "Sheet Pile Excavation and soil strength measurements using computational dynamics" (Under Prof(Dr.) Sibapriya Mukherjee, Department of Civil Engineering, Jadavpur University)-Worked on Sheet Pile designing and Analysis of Braced Excavation.- Worked with the "Software Praxis 2D and 3D" to analyse and tally Analytical results.
experience.description_html: - Dissertation Topic : "Sheet Pile Excavation and soil strength measurements using computational dynamics" (Under Prof(Dr.) Sibapriya Mukherjee, Department of Civil Engineering, Jadavpur University)-Worked on Sheet Pile designing and Analysis of Braced Excavation.- Worked with the "Software Praxis 2D and 3D" to analyse and tally Analytical results. <!---->

experience.title: Summer Internship
experience.description: • Led a team of 2 trainees to analyse failures in an old storage building and propose a new design for the building. • Created an estimation model using MS Excel to estimate the materials required for the construction of a new storage building. • Presented and submitted design was accepted by IOCL for further construction work.
experience.description_html: • Led a team of 2 trainees to analyse failures in an old storage building and propose a new design for the building. • Created an estimation model using MS Excel to estimate the materials required for the construction of a new storage building. • Presented and submitted design was accepted by IOCL for further construction work. <!---->

experience.title: Internship Trainee
experience.description: • Led a team of 3 trainees for the supervision and maintenance of a G+8 parking building to monitor the cost of materials in the construction. • Worked in tandem with the Deputy Project Consultant to develop a time plan of construction of the 100 cr project.• Supervised the inflow and outflow of materials at the site and computed day to day estimation of the required materials using MS Excel.

education.title: Ashoka University
education.description: Activities and Societies: Co-Founder: Cohort Case Study Group | Editor and Coordinator of the official YIF Yearbook ✓Selected on full-tuition scholarship ($14,000) for the Young India Fellowship (YIF), a one-year multidisciplinary postgraduate diploma programme that brings together a group of bright young individuals who show exceptional intellectual ability and leadership potential from the country, and trains them to become socially committed agents of change across the country. YIF is delivered in collaboration with the University of Pennsylvania's School of Engineering and Applied Sciences (SEAS);… Show more
